item.description:
The Public has spoken and we've scheduled Tea Dances through the rest of the year. This Event is designed to bring GLBT Folks, Friends and Allies together for dancing, fellowship, socializing and more. DJ Dawn will spin the tunes, our kitchen will be open with a special Tea Dance menu. Our full bar will provide alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. The dance floor will be open, Join us for dancing, laughing, games and more.
Proper ID Required 21+, $7 Cover charge

The rest of dates are scheduled as Sunday Tea Dances at 5pm:

August 19th: Summer Luau Tea Dance
September 23rd: Harvest Tea Dance for Fall
October 28th: Monster Mash Halloween Tea Dance
November 25th: Thanksgiving Sunday Tea Dance

The facebook event link:http://www.facebook.com/events/389463851116364/ and our website calendar event listing can be shared through google, just click on more details...http//www.harvestcafeonline.com. thanks, Karen

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: mid-summer madness tea dance for all
